name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s reachability.vcl -t Marabou -o reachability.inputquery/ --network f:NO_FILE

name: Agda
run: vehicle compile -s reachability.vcl -t Agda -o reachability.agda -c proofcache.vclp --network f:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s reachability.vcl -t LossFunction -o reachability.loss.json --network f:NO_FILE
